<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Check Business Process Outcome</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[    gs.info('Loop 1');
    var gt = new GlideRecord('x_hsb11_hsbc_mss_o_business_process_stage');
    if (gt.get('f48d759f1b7271d0ff37eb14b24bcb0a')) {
        gs.info('Loop 1');
        var mandatoryVars = [gt.confirm_trade, gt.put_trade_on_hold, gt.resume_trade, gt.settle_trade, gt.process_trade_cancellation, gt.trade_amend];
        var flag = false;
        for (var i = 0; i < mandatoryVars.length; i++) {
            if (gt.getValue(mandatoryVars[i])) {
                gs.info('true loop');
                flag = true;
                break;
            } else
                flag = false;
        }
        if (!flag) {

            gs.info("Trade not eligle to create a case record");

        } else
            gs.info("Trade eligle to create a case record");

    }]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>45381533@hsbc.com</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-06-17 04:43:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0b18e9921b7602106ed00e1ad34bcbcb</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Check Business Process Outcome</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a58cfda01bcb6910ff37eb14b24bcb18</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a58cfda01bcb6910ff37eb14b24bcb18</sys_scope>

        <sys_updated_by>45381533@hsbc.com</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-06-17 04:51:49</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
